UWparserrr 2022.03.08.1200
  • Reference

    Reference

    All functions

    assert_IPEDS_fields()

    Tests whether all the parsed, individual racial data fields are present in the supplied dataframe/tibble

    build_date_filename()

    Build a file name with a date/time

    delete_old_files()

    Keep only the most recent file in a directory that matches a pattern

    factorize_interval()

    Converts a lubridate interval object into a character factor

    fct_num_range()

    Parse and re-level ambiguous numerical range factors

    filter_files_by_date()

    Filter file list based on their date attributes

    fortify_app_steps()

    Fortify applicant data with Y/N fields for major application steps

    mean_trim_by_n()

    Calculate a trimmed mean, removing n values from each end of the sequence

    norm_date_on_year()

    Calculates the academic, fiscal, or application year given a date object

    parse_acad_year()

    Calculates the academic, fiscal, or application year given a date object

    parse_gender()

    Parse gender data and fortify with a standardized, ternary gender field

    parse_hispanic_boolean()

    Parse a binary field of Hispanic/Latino designation

    parse_hispanic_code()

    Parse the AMCAS Hispanic code field

    parse_hispanic_text()

    Parse a text field containing Hispanic/Latino ethnicity information

    parse_ipeds()

    Creates a single, IPEDS-standardized field for race/ethnicity based on the individual fields created through the 'parse_race' function

    parse_race_code()

    Parse code-based racial identity field and fortify the dataset with individual fields for each of the IPEDS racial categories.

    parse_race_text()

    Parse text-based racial identity field and fortify the dataset with individual fields for each of the IPEDS racial categories.

    parse_urm()

    Parse the fortified, standardized race and ethnicity columns in the dataset, and fortify with a new column, calculated URM status.

    parse_WI_residency()

    Appends a single Wisconsin residency determination field to the dataset

    pull_files_by_date()

    Sort selected files in a directory based on their date attribute

    sort_files_by_date()

    Sort file list based on their date attributes

    test_race_field()

    Tests whether the field is formatted based on the AMCAS / Dept. of Education racial code standard framework.

    update_file_repo()

    Update archive/repository files with most recent versions

    use_UW_colors()

    Use/Load UW Color Palette

    Contents
